original_text: And these are the sons of Ehud: these are the heads of the fathers of the inhabitants of Geba, and they removed them to Manahath:
korean_text: 에훗의 아들들은 이러하니라 그들은 게바 주민의 우두머리로서, 사로잡혀 마나핫으로 갔으니

sentences.original_text: And these are the sons of Ehud
these are the heads of the fathers
and they removed them to Manahath
